dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Title cartouche is framed by fronds and topped by a cherub. The scale cartouche is topped by a crowned French coat of arms. This state was published in atlases by Jan Jansson in 1636 and 1637. From the Jansson Appendix Atlas 1636-1680, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 37 x 49 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Appendix Atlas.
dct_spatial_sm: Maine-et-Loire, Pays de la Loire, France
